text:
I could not get the existing setup.py play nice with sdist so I started from the PyPA [sample project](https://github.com/pypa/sampleproject)
- remove the 2to3 stuff since I don't think Python3 support is the focus at the moment
- remove lines in setup.py I didn't understand and seem related to uploading documentation to pythonhosted.org and creating eggs. Also from looking at joblib, it seems like generate_help needs setupegg.py to define it.

Comments welcome!
title: Fix setup.py for release

title: Fix setup.py for release
Pull request merge from lesteve/nilearn:fix-setup-py-for-release to nilearn/nilearn:master

text:
>   â€¢ remove lines in setup.py I didn't understand and seem related to uploading
>     documentation to pythonhosted.org and creating eggs. Also from looking at
>     joblib, it seems like generate_help needs setupegg.py to define it.

Yes, we don't need generate_help in nilearn.

Rewrite setup.py from scratch

or rather using https://github.com/pypa/sampleproject. Also disable alias in setup.cfg

Remove setup.py aliases

They only seem to make sense when the doc is hosted on pythonhosted.org

Add missing __init__.py

to make sure tests are included in sdist
Use find_packages and specify a few data packages

Follow PEP 440 for version name

and use nilearn.__version__ in setup.py
